property.label: Protocol
property.description: Select the protocol that will be used to establish the connection. If 'https' is selected, a secure connection will be made using SSL.

property.label: Port
property.description: Enter the port number of the webserver. The default HTTP port is 80. Pass -1 to ignore the port.

property.label: Port
property.description: Enter the port number of the webserver. The default port for HTTP over SSL is 443. Pass -1 to ignore the port.

property.label: Path
property.description: Enter the path to the webpage to be monitored. Example: /index.html

property.label: Method
property.description: Specify the type of the HTTP request. GET: retrieve the page content, HEAD: retrieve HTTP headers only, POST: send data with the request and retrive the page content (e.g. used for HTML forms)

property.label: POST Data
property.description: The data which will be sent with the POST request.

property.label: Response Format
property.description: The format of the HTTP response. JSON or XML.

property.label: HTTP version
property.description: The version of the HTTP protocol. HTTP/1.1 is the recommended.

property.label: User-Agent
property.description: The user agent string identifies the HTTP client and is sent with every request.

property.label: Server authorization
property.description: Specify the authentication type to be used.

property.label: Server username
property.description: The username that is used for authorization with the server. For NTLM authentication use a DOMAIN\username notation.

property.label: Server password
property.description: The password for the username.

property.label: Preemptive server authentication
property.description: If enabled, preemptive authentication will be used to connect to the URL

property.label: Socket Timeout
property.description: The timeout for socket connection in miliseconds. Default is 60000 (1 minute), setting this to 0 will disable the timeout.

property.label: Connection Timeout
property.description: The timeout for connection acquisition in miliseconds. Default is 60000 (1 minute), setting this to 0 will disable the timeout.

property.label: Proxy
property.description: If enabled, the configured HTTP proxy server will be used to access the URL.

property.label: Proxy host
property.description: The hostname of the HTTP proxy server.

property.label: Proxy port
property.description: The port of the HTTP proxy server.

property.label: Proxy authorization
property.description: If the HTTP proxy server requires a username and a password for access, proxy authorization needs to be enabled.

property.label: Proxy username
property.description: The username that is used for authorization with the HTTP proxy server.

property.label: Proxy password
property.description: The password for the proxy username.

property.label: Preemptive proxy authentication
property.description: If enabled, preemptive authentication will be used authenticate against the proxy.

property.label: Dynatrace Tagging
property.description: Enable Dynatrace tagging.

property.label: timer name
property.description: Identify this webrequest through a unique timer name. The timer name will be sent with each web request as a Dynatrace header field value.

property.label: Disable certificate validation
property.description: Enable to allow connections via SSL even if the certificate of the target host does not match the host name or is self-signed.
